channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13447] LLAP: check ZK acls for registry and fail if they are too permissive
item.description: Only the current ("hive") user can have write access.
item.summary: LLAP: check ZK acls for registry and fail if they are too permissive

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: prasanth_j can you take a look?

Actually this probably won't work as is. The path returned is the full path, but the getACLs will namespace the path. Looks like we'd either need to unnamespace the path, or get our own ZK client.

The general approach can still be reviewed though

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12800103/HIVE-13447.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12800103 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build
Added the no-namespace call. Thanks for the pointer!
Does this also cover the ZK path used by the ZKSecretManager ?
No, there's a separate (linked) JIRA for that

Doc note: This adds hive.llap.validate.acls to HiveConf.java, so it will need to be documented in the LLAP section of Configuration Properties for release 2.1.0.
